description:
It's that time again...time for a smoking hot NextDoorMale scene. But don't adjust your monitor if you're seeing double. There really is TWO of them, and they look exactly the same!

Meet Mathew and David Studding, also known as the Studding Twins. These 21 year old Aquarius's have enjoyed the last few weeks playing with our other models, opening their minds to the sexual bliss that can come from both sexes, so it was only a matter of time before these two hotties made it over here to NextDoorMale.

Enjoy these two as they shower off after jogging, and then unload their balls while kicking back on our bed.
title: David & Matt Studding
